description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the information disclosure vulnerability in Windows Message Queuing Client (MSMQC), apply the necessary updates:

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture (e.g., x64, ARM64).
2. Download and install the following updates relevant to your environment:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5034123](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
   - For Windows Server 2022: [KB5034130](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034130)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5034122](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
   - Additional updates: [KB5034171](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034171), [KB5034184](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034184), [KB5034121](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121), [KB5034127](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034127)

**Details**:
- Applying these updates helps prevent attackers from potentially reading small portions of memory which may lead to information disclosure.
- Ensure that your system is updated regularly to protect against similar vulnerabilities.

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that you have administrative privileges to install these updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation to prevent data loss in case of complications.
